body.body: Follow up issue: Judge whether or how this tag should stay in the taxonomy.
Based on issue #7 we created the tag _ginfo: dialog_ previously known as _choose dialog option_.

body.value: should it be called AI communication
like this it is difficult to diffirentiate between content and type
differentiate between dialog that are import or not important for the game progress (Main-Dialog, non trivial choices, narrative choices, possibilities tag)

body.body: It was agreed, that this tag can be ignored for now since it is currently not part of the tree anyway. But one should keep in mind, that _making a choice_ is not the same as _gather information_ even though this tag is currently used for this. This gets more clear when talking about _emotional challenges_ where it is questionable what the _problem solving technique_ is. This does not mean, that choosing a dialog option is necessaryly the solving technique, since it is more what you do rather then a coping mechanism.
Based on the discussion of the 15.10.2024 this issue was closed without follow up issue.
